thread.title: The Mothership: 'The Walking Dead' with Justin Guarini
thread.title_full: The Mothership: 'The Walking Dead' with Justin Guarini

title: The Mothership: 'The Walking Dead' with Justin Guarini
text:
'The Walking Dead' (Photo: Gene Page, AMC)
5 CONNECT 28 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE There is a very special guest aboard The Mothership this week.
American Idol alum Justin Guarini gets his nerd on with USA TODAY's Kelly Lawler ( @klawls ), Brett Molina ( @brettmolina23 ), Carly Mallenbaum ( @ThatGirlCarly ) and Brian Truitt ( @briantruitt ) for a very special episode of our weekly nerdy podcast. Zombie fan Guarini joins us to talk about T he Walking Dead 's upcoming season, and what we've loved (and not so much loved) about the show in the past.
For our Nerd Alert segment we discuss the shakeup in Marvel's Phase 3 movie lineup , including adding an Ant-Man sequel ( Ant-Man and the Wasp ) and pushing back the much-anticipated Captain Marvel .
Have a question, comment or a show topic suggestion? Reach out to us on Twitter. Plus, subscribe to and review The Mothership on iTunes here !
